definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: One box tropical fish is raised in the Internet bar, raise a flower that can catch mouse to spend a cat even.
sentences.chinese: 網吧裏養一箱熱帶魚，甚至養一條能捉老鼠的花花貓。

sentences.english: Soft corals and tropical fish at H.P. Reef.
sentences.chinese: 礁附近柔軟的珊瑚和熱帶魚。

sentences.english: Another example is tropical fish, which use their colorations to show sexual receptiveness.
sentences.chinese: 另一個例子是熱帶魚，它們用顏色來表示交配的意願。

sentences.english: Tropical fish and coral, Daisy's Drop-off.
sentences.chinese: 在黛西潛水點拍到的熱帶魚和珊瑚。

sentences.english: Many people keep them as tropical fish.
sentences.chinese: 許多人保留他們作爲熱帶魚。

sentences.english: By rights, some tropical fish reproduce by laying eggs.
sentences.chinese: 按理說，有些熱帶魚靠產卵繁殖。

sentences.english: We went snorkelling straight off the beach and could see amazing tropical fish.
sentences.chinese: 我們去海灘潛水，看漂亮的熱帶魚。

sentences.english: Find yourself thinking about tropical fish in your bathtub?
sentences.chinese: 你還躲在浴缸中對熱帶魚念念不忘嗎？

definition: all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
fantastic oddities of every description (idiom); grotesquely shaped
reptiles/also written 爬行類|爬行类
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
